This city’s improvements, buildings, and districts cannot be damaged by Environmental Effects. Improved or city center’s tiles with floodplains and volcanic soil gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production.

Builders can construct the City Park improvement (gives [ICON_Gold] Gold, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, improves adjacent tiles Appeal). City Parks provide additional +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture if Liang is in the city. Can be built on any terrain. Can be built on swamp.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Fisheries.[NEWLINE]Yields 1 [ICON_Food] Food, +0.5 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_Production] Production if adjacent at leat to one Fishing Boat. Must be built on a coastal plot. Cannot be built adjacent to another Fishery.

A [ICON_Governor] Governor unique improvement that can be built in empire with a Surveyor Governor with the Parks and Recreation promotion. Yields +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and 2 Appeal. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to water (river, lake, coast, oasis). Additional [ICON_Gold] Gold with new civics. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity from the first City Park in the city. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture if in a city with a Surveyor Governor with the Parks and Recreation promotion. Cannot be adjacent to another City Park. Can be built on any terrain. Can be built on swamp.
